name: LI LA
aboutMe: My name is lila and I come from China. Now I'm a full-time student at Conestoga College in the Reporting Systems and Database program. I graduated from University of Science and Technology of China with the bachelor degree in Computer Science and Technology, and from Shanghai Jiao Tong University with master degree in Law. During my postgraduate study, I obtained Chinese Legal Professional Qualification Certificate. To better practice myself, I worked as an intern in Shanghai Pudong New District Court, Hiways Law Firm and Legal Department of Tencent Technology (Shenzhen) Company Limited. Since my graduation in 2021, I have been working as a legal counsel in Tencent, with main responsibility to review technology import and export research projects and contracts, rovide interpretation of U.S. export control laws and policies, create technology control plans, and provide guidance and training to staff as needed. Besides, I am involved in developing, testing and maintaining Tencent's technology import and export compliance database and system.
china: China is a captivating nation located in East Asia with a rich history and vibrant culture. It blends ancient traditions with modern advancements and boasts stunning landmarks like the Great Wall and the Terracotta Army. China's rapid economic growth has made it a global powerhouse, while its cities showcase futuristic architecture and bustling markets. The country's cuisine, diverse landscapes, and artistic traditions, along with its technological innovations, make it an enticing destination that offers a wealth of experiences and a fascinating window into its ancient heritage and contemporary achievements.
